name: yi-er-fu-backend
description: 颐尔福售后系统后端服务

scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:auth && npm run deploy:issues && npm run deploy:upload && npm run deploy:statistics && npm run deploy:notifications && npm run deploy:faq
scripts.deploy:auth: cd cloud/functions/auth && npm install && cd ../../.. && wx-server-sdk deploy auth
scripts.deploy:issues: cd cloud/functions/issues && npm install && cd ../../.. && wx-server-sdk deploy issues
scripts.deploy:upload: cd cloud/functions/upload && npm install && cd ../../.. && wx-server-sdk deploy upload
scripts.deploy:statistics: cd cloud/functions/statistics && npm install && cd ../../.. && wx-server-sdk deploy statistics
scripts.deploy:notifications: cd cloud/functions/notifications && npm install && cd ../../.. && wx-server-sdk deploy notifications
scripts.deploy:faq: cd cloud/functions/faq && npm install && cd ../../.. && wx-server-sdk deploy faq

author: YiErFu Team
